prerequisite: Ranger, Beast Mastery class feature, Mark of Handling feat
name: Vadalis Griffonmaster
text: In the final years of the Last War, House Vadalis began training griffon riders—soldiers mounted on domesticated griffons. As a Vadalis griffonmaster, you had a hand in training those griffons and their riders. With your dragon mark’s power, you’ve become an expert rider who is at home on the back of a griffon.

features.griffonmasterAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack, your Vadalis-bred griffon can take a standard action or a move action after your attack
features.vadalisGriffon(11thLevel): You can swap your current beast companion for a Vadalis-bred griffon
features.vadalisRitualTechniques(16thLevel): You have mastered and can perform the Commune with Nature and Phantom Steed rituals as if you had the Ritual Caster feat

flavorText: Look to the skies, my friends. There you’ll find me.
